mapper.select: SELECT a.rn, a.userId, a.title, a.contents, a.regDate, a.fileId FROM ( SELECT a.rn, a.userId, a.title, a.contents, a.regDate, a.fileId FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, USER_ID userId, TITLE title, CONTENTS contents, REGDATE regDate, FILE_ID fileId FROM IDEA_BOARD) a WHERE rn <= 30 * 1) a WHERE rn > 30 * (1 - 1)
